description: Albania midfielder Ylber Ramadani leaves Aberdeen to join Serie A side Lecce for an undisclosed fee.
title: Aberdeen: Ylber Ramadani joins Lecce for undisclosed fee
title_page: Aberdeen: Ylber Ramadani joins Lecce for undisclosed fee - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Aberdeen is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
